properties.description: This initiative deploys Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts to monitor Azure Arc-enabled Servers.
properties.displayName: Deploy Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts for Hybrid VMs

metadata.description: The subscription ID of the management subscription where the user assigned managed identity will be created.
Tag name used to disable monitoring at the resource level. Set to true if monitoring should be disabled.
metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitoring disabled tag name

metadata.description: Tag value(s) used to disable monitoring at the resource level. Set to true if monitoring should be disabled.
metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitoring disabled tag values(s)

metadata.description: Location of the resource group where the ALZ Monitor resources will be deployed
metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitor Resource Group Location

metadata.description: Name of the resource group where the ALZ Monitor resources will be deployed
metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitor Resource Group Name

metadata.description: Tags for the resource group where the ALZ Monitor resources will be deployed
metadata.displayName: ALZ Monitor Resource Group Tags

metadata.description: The name of the user assigned managed identity to be created for monitoring purpose.
metadata.displayName: Name of the user assigned managed identity to be created.

metadata.description: The resource Id of the user assigned managed identity provided by the customer.
metadata.displayName: Customer defined User Assigned managed Identity resource Id.

metadata.description: Severity of the alert for VM Data Disk Read Latency
metadata.displayName: Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Alert Severity

metadata.description: Alert state for the alert, true will enable the alert, false will disable the alert
metadata.displayName: Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Alert State
Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Auto Mitigate
Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Auto Resolve

metadata.description: Auto Resolve Time for the alert
metadata.displayName: Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Auto Resolve Time

metadata.description: Computers To Include for the alert
metadata.displayName: Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Computers To Include
Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Evaluation Frequency
Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Evaluation Periods
Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Failing Periods
Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Operator

metadata.description: Policy effect for the alert, deployIfNotExists will deploy the alert if it does not exist
metadata.displayName: Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Policy Effect
Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Threshold
Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Time Aggregation
Hybrid VM Data Disk Read Latency Window Size
